paper.title: A spectral characterization of correlation-immune combining functions

author.org: Dept. of Math., Northwest Telecommun. Eng. Inst., Xian, China

paper.abstract: It is shown that a Boolean combining function f(x) of n variables is mth-order correlation-immune if and only if its Walsh transform F( omega ) vanishes for all omega with Hamming weight between 1 and m, inclusive. This result is used to extend slightly Siegenthaleru0027s (IEEE Trans. Comput., vol. C-34, pp. 81-85, Jan. 1985) characterization of the algebraic normal form of correlation-immune combining functions. u003e
